function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper representation in OSM databases","Impact":"Inability to apply the solution to certain regions, limiting the scope of the project","Mitigation":"Ensure that regions of interest are properly represented in the OSM databases","Technologies":"OSM platform, data collection and integration tools","People":"Researchers, data collectors, OSM contributors","Owner":"Research team, OSM contributors"},{"Description":"Social factors affecting occupancy model","Impact":"Inaccuracy in the occupancy model due to neglect of social factors","Mitigation":"Incorporate social factors such as meal times and school start times into the occupancy model","Technologies":"Data collection tools, modeling software","People":"City planners, data analysts","Owner":"Research team, city authorities"},{"Description":"Abstract definition of danger areas","Impact":"Difficulty in operationalizing the concept of danger areas for pedestrian routing","Mitigation":"Clearly define and operationalize what constitutes a dangerous area or hotspot from the perspective of pedestrian routing paths","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, pedestrian routing algorithms","People":"GIS experts, urban planners, geospatial analysts","Owner":"Research team, city authorities"}]}
